website_summaries.verdict: A nice, large grilling spatula that will handle just about any food you need to flip.
pros: It has a stainless steel blade that's riveted to a smooth wooden handle that will feel good in your hand
The blade has a generously sized face (4 by 8 inches), making it handy for flipping even large pieces of meat on the grill
cons: The blade is thin and flexible, making it less than ideal for grilling heavier foods and the rivets in the handle seem loose, even when new

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Spatula
customer_reviews.text: As you can see by the photo, I LOVE to Smoke and GRILL!! I Bought this Spatula knowing that it would be used A LOT!! Its Outstanding when it comes to getting anything up off the grill (YES, EVEN AN 18lb Brisket!!) Now most people wouldn't use a spatula to do something like that but I did in order to see if its as strong as it was reported to be. IT IS!!! And its a SNAP to clean as its GREAT STAINLESS STEEL!! Not Cheap Chinese Junk!!
customer_reviews.author: Wil Engle

customer_reviews.title: Good spatula, the handle isn't perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's a good spatula, I've used it for regular bacon and eggs on a large cast-iron griddle. After one hand-washing, the handle develop some raised grain which required sanding and waxing. The handle and metal aren't perfect and it could benefit from a stop at the belt-sander. I knock one star off for the wood and (lack of) finish.
customer_reviews.author: JamesM

customer_reviews.title: Great for the grill. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this item long, but am impressed so far. It is well made and is great for the grill. Time will tell about the durability, but no concerns so far. I bought this item for myself, but am sure it would make a great gift for someone that enjoys grilling.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Rigg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality on the grill
customer_reviews.text: This thing works a lot better than my pancake flipper on the grill, and it doesn't melt in the heat. Seriously, though, this thing is pro quality, heavy duty, better than what you'd get in one of those grill sets you get for Father's Day. It has a nice weight to it, and a comfortable wood handle. It's long enough to fit 2 1/3 pound burger patties at once and still have a little room. And really, for grilling all you need is one of these babies and a nice, heavy duty, long pair of tongs and you're ready to be Master of your grill.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great spatulata, great materials, no cutting edge
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with the quality of this spatula, especially considering the price. The stainless steel is of a good thickness and the wood handle is constructed nicely. I only gave it four stars because the description says that it has a cutting edge, but there is no cutting edge. All of the edges of the spatula are of the same thickness, which I don't mind, but there is no edge that would clearly work well for cutting. Otherwise, though, this is a really high quality spatula for a really great price. Just don't expect to cut anything other than the softest of food with it.
customer_reviews.author: Randall A Ford

customer_reviews.title: it does say extra large, if you missed that ...
customer_reviews.text: it does say extra large, if you missed that, your fault! If you make real flapjacks, this will do it. Two quarter pound burgers at once... 10 breakfast links... if you've got a griddle of any size, you need at least one of these, I use two when making scrambled eggs, corned beef hash, stir fry anything... you get the picture. The beveled edges are a bonus + in a pinch though I'm a bit shy of using the long edge with any force. It isn't the tool for all turning, there are many instances where I need a narrower blade.
customer_reviews.author: Norm-al

customer_reviews.title: A beast!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beast. Kill a bear and flip pancakes with ease. I love this thing. Well made, heavy steel, perfect for burgers steaks pancakes and fish
customer_reviews.author: springer scott

customer_reviews.title: This is BIG
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a big turner and this one fit the bill. It does not have flexibility as very sturdy. It is a lifetime product. Cannot it envision it ever wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give this a better rating but because the rivots are loose right out of the box, I can't. I like that the spatula is large and the metal appears to be in good shape. Unfortunately, I'm going to have to find a way to secure the handle on tighter since it's not worth the hassle to send it back and hope for a better one. Slightly disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: jdlyn2000

customer_reviews.title: Great for the griddle or grill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on our new outdoor griddle, and it's exactly what I needed. The spatula part is nice and long allowing us to "flip" larger quantities at a time, and it's sharp enough to get under burgers and fish easily. The shorter handle makes it easier to wield than longer handled models. The only reason I did not give it five stars is that the handle is not great quality, and it came with a crape across it. Still, for the money, this is a very useful cooking tool!
customer_reviews.author: Carols

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I use it all the time for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one BIG pancake flipper! I love it. I use it all the time for camping, and it works great. I wrapped some Hockey tape on the handle for extra "gription".
customer_reviews.author: mt.man

customer_reviews.title: Quality and big
customer_reviews.text: Big griddle spatula. I bought 2 and they are perfect. The smaller ones just don't work as well when you are doing Rice, scrambled eggs and bulky amounts of food on the Blackstone. These are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty AND heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This spatula is overkill unless you l're flipping brontosaurus burgers. It's pretty heavy but still usable if you feel the urge to use a heavy duty spatula. Wood handles loosen up after several uses but it's still usable. Take care of it and you won't have a problem. Looking back, I really didn't need such a heavy duty spatula when I bought it, on the other hand, I won't be throwing it away anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: NETX Woodworker

customer_reviews.title: I had to send this back...
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this back. The handle was loose and it did not look like it was going to last very long. I wish that someone had given it a once over before dropping it in the box as it was a pretty obvious defect. Maybe the Amazon Robots that do the packaging need some further training on this, or a little re-programming? Just kidding here of course, I do love the Amazon Robots and all that they do for me with 2 day shipping and all!
customer_reviews.author: DoubleD

customer_reviews.title: Not as sharp as I would like
customer_reviews.text: Not as sharp as I would like. Like a safety knife. I wanted something that could cut through meat and this doesn't really do the trick. It's great for pressing down smash burgers though.
customer_reviews.author: harrydtyson

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is better than I imagined. I wasn't sure exactly what I would get ordering online. It is great, very sturdy. Big, perfect size. I wish there was a hole drilled in the handle for hanging this up. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The spatula looks well made , hefty and looks like it would do the job or most people, but description said it comes with cutting edge. It does NOT. Or at least mind did not....mine came with 3 squared off edges.... I was looking for the type that you can cut/chop with on edge or use as a scraper on a grill. This will do neither.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: He likes it even though he told me to stop buying kitchen gadgets
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this spatula. It truly is a man sized utensil. He used to get so upset when he would try to transfer a beautiful fish filet to the serving plate and it broke all up. Now he can easily slide the filet onto the spatula and then on to a plate without problems. I think it would do the job for lifting heavy food like a turkey to it's serving platter. A good kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Annie

customer_reviews.title: This spatula is great for smashburgers and anything else
customer_reviews.text: This spatula is great for smashburgers and anything else. Its on the big side but thats fine and its definitely got some heft to it. As others have noted though when pressing down on the spatula the handle feels loose. I have a feeling it'll break off in my hand one day but we'll see. Until then I'll keep smashing burgers!
customer_reviews.author: Warren73

customer_reviews.title: Works just like we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: As a family, we make pan pizza every Saturday night. It is always tricky to get the pizza out of the pan without ripping the crust. I saw on an episode of Cook's Country where they made a pan pizza and used a giant spatula to get the pizza out of the pan. So I thought, I should check Amazon. And voila! I received my spatula and my pizza came out of the pan perfectly! Saturday night pizza is saved!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ammermann

customer_reviews.title: Extra large spatula
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, very well made, turns my 8 inch diameter hash browns easily. Highly recommended, Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Z.T.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Spatula!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good spatula for my grill and this is it! Long, strong and SS! Dont't waste your money on those cheap charbroil spatulas that bend; these are what your grill wants you to use.
customer_reviews.author: 1776TX

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy, high quality spatula. It's large. Great for the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not quality
customer_reviews.text: This spatula is just ok. The metal is of decent grade but the handle is made of cheap wood stained to look like hardwood. I've yet to use this item but I can feel that the rivets in the handle are already loose. This is NOT anywhere close to commercial grade. It is very large and would be hard to use in even a large frying pan. I got it for a camp stove griddle application so I hope I can get a couple of years out of it before the handle crumbles.
customer_reviews.author: Ken W

customer_reviews.title: A great wide heavy duty spatula you will love!
customer_reviews.text: If you grill as much as I do and will be grilling even more for graduating high schoolers, neighbors, Neighborhood Watch meetings, etc. you need a heavy duty extra large 16 inch spatula with a cutting edge built in, in your repertoire! I do not know how I did without this spatula this long, but I am glad I won't have to do without it now!
customer_reviews.author: Cajun GourmetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This spatula is the exact length that I need. The quality is outstanding and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXTRA-LARGE  16-INCHED LONG, GRILL SPATULA/TURNER (BBQ)
customer_reviews.text: WHAT YOU SEE, IS WHAT YOU GET and I got it! It's a nice spatula but its tooooooooo big for me. A LARGE would've worked perfect for me. It does get under those large pieces of salmon, to big for burger. I should've set it back, but didn't. I've made the best of it. My only complaint TOOOOOOOOOOOOO LARGE for me. I will NOT gave a bad rating due to my purchasing error.
customer_reviews.author: RAD

customer_reviews.title: Big Beautiful High Utility Spatula
customer_reviews.text: This is the largest statula I have ever seen, and it is glorious as a tool around the hot grill, flipping very large slabs of meat (fish fillets, particularly, and ribs). A great piece of grilling equipment, with a full tang and just a little flex under heavier loads, that you will use for many years at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: steve stehr

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband had been wanting a Grill Spatula for a long time but we could not find exactly what he wanted. He complained that he was going to have to go to a restaurant supply store to see if he could purchase one. That is when I decided to look for it on Amazon. Of course Amazon had it. After reading the other reviews we decided to purchase it. It is of high quality and we can't brag enough about it. It was exactly what we were looking for. Take heed....16 inches long means 16 inches long. We loved it so much we purchased a second one for our son. He too loves it.
customer_reviews.author: ANF

customer_reviews.title: I love to cook and love great kitchen tools
customer_reviews.text: I love to cook and love great kitchen tools! These are nice and big and one of the edges is sharpened. Can't wait to use them, big company bbq next week and these will make their debut. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Casey E.

customer_reviews.title: Works great two handed with a nice chefs knife on a grill
customer_reviews.text: would buy this again if this one would ever wear out. I cook alot, this is my go to tool even if i dont need it for what im cooking, i will still pick it up for ballast.
customer_reviews.author: D. C.

customer_reviews.title: Extra-Large 16in long, grill spatula, turner spatula,Barbecue BBQ spatula, w/cutting Edge, solid stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel construction is great, it has all the surface you need to handle just about anything on the grill. The only issue I have with the spatula is the rivets on the handle, mine arrived with a loose handle. I fear with prolonged use this will be a problem. Overall nice spatula for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: huge
customer_reviews.text: I got this and it was HUGE, so I gave it to my dad for fathers day to use it on his huge griddle he has outside of his house. he really likes it, I did not realize how huge it was going to be when I bought it, so know this thing is huge
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a large spatula. Very sturdy not flimsy feeling. Used it to get a pork butt off my smoker so it wouldn’t fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cue

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and durable, gigantic
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and durable. Just note that it is gigantic! Really only suitable for use on a BBQ or other grill surface that's at least 2 feet long.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: If you want it beveled you have to grind it yourself
customer_reviews.text: The description of this spatula lead you to believe that one side is beveled. The picture leads you to believe that 2 sides are beveled. I received it and no edges are beveled and the stainless is so thick it would be like trying to flip a pancake with a book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Long, sturdy! Won’t bend with weight of food. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: SDfit

customer_reviews.title: Good husband swatter as well
customer_reviews.text: tall enough for my big kettle that now I don't burn my hand when I'm making jellies. Good husband swatter as well, just the right heft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Well made awesome product. Use it every time I BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ray Guilliam

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilling high quantities of food.
customer_reviews.text: I cant say enough about this spatula. If you cook a large quantity of burgers or chicken it is great for flipping 2 or 3 at a time. If you're using seriously high heat it might be better to go with a spatula with a longer handle but this should work in 90% of grilling situations quite well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nasca

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Philly cheesesteak enthusiast brother. He loves it! He's used it several times and he chops the living.....out of the meat. It hasn't dented or chipped up. Great pick!
customer_reviews.author: LDB22

customer_reviews.title: It's HUGE, but good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one not realizing the size of it compared to my 12" cast iron skillet, but I'm going to use this one on the Grill outside this summer. Nice solid wood handle seems like for the price it will hold up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S. Evangelista

customer_reviews.title: Large and sturdy. They will make great gifts for the grillers ...
customer_reviews.text: Large and sturdy. They will make great gifts for the grillers in my family. May order a few more. A great value.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: not as described
customer_reviews.text: This is a very large and heavy spatula it is supposed to have a cutting edge but the one we received does not. the blade is very thick and blunt so it will be hard to slide it under food on the grill. Some of the reviews mentioned a loose handle the one we received seems to be tight.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: King size spatula
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it five stars if it were the right size (a little smaller), but that's my fault, there are smaller ones out there. This is too cumbersome to flip stuff for me, perhaps someone with cooking skills would fair much better then me.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I want to learn to cut up the meat for Philly Cheese Steaks like they do at restaurants
customer_reviews.text: OK, it's larger than I thought. I want to learn to cut up the meat for Philly Cheese Steaks like they do at restaurants, so I got this. So this was a very intentional order. I'll make it work. The product itself, exactly what I wanted, size aside. But that's on me.
customer_reviews.author: E D

customer_reviews.title: Well made... huge.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice spatula, but it's very big. That's not a criticism, just an observation. I think it will work great on the grill, or if you have a large flat top griddle, it's just a little large fit most skillets. Well constructed, and great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: justinsdusso

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected but what did expect from 'Extra-Large'? ...
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected but what did expect from 'Extra-Large'? We call it Greg and he's the king of spatulas.
customer_reviews.author: EMB

customer_reviews.title: Rusting
customer_reviews.text: Has this less than 2 weeks and it is already rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dunkerson

customer_reviews.title: Gonna be great for flipping burgers on the grill
customer_reviews.text: This thing is big, thick and girthy...heavy duty. Gonna be great for flipping burgers on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The size is good but the metal is too thick for getting under eggs without messing them all up.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Spatula!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this spatula. I love the weight of it. It feels very expensive and is a staple for a lot of cooking around the house. I love the size and the edge is great for flipping many things from burgers to veggies. This is my second one I have purchased and have even given one as a gift! Will definitely buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O.

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty spatula
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty spatula. Sturdy for flipping heavy burgers and firm enough to easily get under an egg or anything that might have a little stick to it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: great spatula
customer_reviews.text: Looks good works great and would seem to last a long time. I bought to turn fish on the grill and it work excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Auburn Alum

customer_reviews.title: Missing rivet upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with rivet that had already fallen out of the handle. Which made the handle kinda flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Joekidd00

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: STURDY, NICE PRODUCT. HANDLE IS A LITTLE SHORT FOR THE LENGTH OF THE SPATULA.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Robbins

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good spatula the only thing wrong with this product is it is a bit heavy so if you are going to cook for any length of time it will work you out. For the normal home cook it will be okay.
customer_reviews.author: rlm

customer_reviews.title: Don't camp without it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this for camping. We leave it in the trailer and use it on our outdoor CampChef stove. All our camping friends came to our stove to use it!
customer_reviews.author: jml

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package to find out it was damaged. Half of the wooden handle was broken off, and not even inside the package. It looks decent otherwise, but it's a shame I won't be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: C S

customer_reviews.title: Good Spatula
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and as expected but the handle was a little loose upon arrival. I'm not too picky though and would rather use it as is than return it. The metal is very heavy duty and a thick gauge. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: CReich910

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband to use on outside grill. It is large enough to flip big steaks, keep hands away from hot grills, and easy clean-up. He loves and and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with quality for the price. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Grill Spatula
customer_reviews.text: This Spatula is big and heavy. I used it on the grill and yes it working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L.

customer_reviews.title: what you see is what you get
customer_reviews.text: nice big spatula for bbqing. i cook a lot of salmon and you need big grill spatulas for the turn. this gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: KRANZO

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient
customer_reviews.text: When roasting veggies on a sheet pan and turning them over halfway through the baking time, this spatula turns them 10 times faster than a regular, small turner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product and does what's expected
customer_reviews.text: Good product and does what's expected. Might be really large for you if you are not using it on a at least 20" griddle. Feels little bit flexible since the blade is really large. The quality of the wooden handle might have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Took along time to get order..,it is heavy duty quality product, will last through my lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: It's cool because it's long. When I will barbecue I won't get burned by the flames, hopefully, with this long spatula. I like its shape too for flipping over things and not dropping them.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Rusted, Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel started to rust after just one washing. Poor poor quality made of unknown materials. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be a professional burger flipper.
customer_reviews.text: Great for flipping hamburgers and bacon and eggs like the pros do. It is good stainless steel and the handle is make of good wood. Looks like it will last a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. O

customer_reviews.title: works great on my flat top gridlle
customer_reviews.text: works great on my flat top gridlle, I have two so I can use in both hand for turning and stiring
customer_reviews.author: Juan Pena

customer_reviews.title: Best Spatula for Grilling
customer_reviews.text: Love this for turning burgers on my grill. Large enough to turn 1/2 lb patties and handle long enough to not get burned regardless how big the flare up. Good quality and unlike the one I picked up at Walmart, this one shows no signs of rust after several months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Just4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Great bbq tool
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and allows you to keep control of this spatula.
customer_reviews.author: Don Piccirilli

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good blade length, but the handle is a little thick for women's hands. Useable, but could be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: S.Merchant

customer_reviews.title: Big splat
customer_reviews.text: Much larger then expected but thats not a problem wish maybe it had a hole to hang on a hook
customer_reviews.author: Erik A. Lanning

customer_reviews.title: saw how big it was and thought I would hate it but it's completely opposite
customer_reviews.text: I got this, saw how big it was and thought I would hate it but it's completely opposite. It is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this spatula often when cooking on the griddle or grill. I like it because it is so large and you can flip a couple of burgers or pancakes at the same time. I gave it 4 stars because food can be a little difficult to get off the end of the spatula and requires some good scrubbing to remove it all.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: This was way bigger than i thought, but its perfect for hash browns and philly's on my backyard griddle. I did get the smaller one for everyday stuff.. it is big.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: a great spatula!
customer_reviews.text: it arrived very quickly with super saver shipping. it has a full length tang. metal is thick with only a bit of give. im looking forward to use this camping, making breakfast hash.
customer_reviews.author: new to amazon

customer_reviews.title: Hamberger Helper
customer_reviews.text: It a great tool for pressing and flipping hamberger paddies on the grill. It is big enough and strong enough to do the job right without bending out of shape. I had one minor problem: one of the rivets in the wooden handle came apart and needed to be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Madison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my grill. It will last for years...Well-built..........
customer_reviews.author: echo heart

customer_reviews.title: Grillin and Chillin
customer_reviews.text: Must have tool to cook on a flat top grill. Used for everything from bacon, eggs, pancakes, sausage, burgers, dogs. It does it all. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: R.L.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: IT IS PERFECT, PROFESSIONAL AND LONG ENOUGH. BUY IT. I LIKED IT AND YOU WILL LIKE IT TOO. XX XX
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great size and sturdy build.
customer_reviews.text: The spatula has a great feel and works well on a large griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's a beast. Big, sturdy, perfect. Fits two big burgers at once.
customer_reviews.author: jmerwinp

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Grill Spatula
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for flipping pancakes, eggs, burgers, etc. It has the perfect length to flip whatever ever is needed without damaging the food.
customer_reviews.author: Harv

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for use with our outdoor griddle. Really like it. Nice size for flipping burgers, pancakes, and just about anything else I try to griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: It's BIG
customer_reviews.text: It's BIG and the quality seems to be good. The price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice balance with heavy metal blade
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy metal spatula to easily turn pancakes, steak & onions, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Eve B Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Extra Large Spatula
customer_reviews.text: I love this spatula! Cutting edge is vey handy. Spatula is of excellent quality and perfect for the backyard cook or the professional.
customer_reviews.author: T. Maris

customer_reviews.title: Its just okay...
customer_reviews.text: Dont leave it out in the weather. The wood handle ages quickly. Seems I often forget to put these tools away.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for large items on the griddle or large quantities, eggs, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Mullis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for all around cooking an not just for flipping burgers
customer_reviews.author: Victor Lopez III

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I use this product everytime I BBQ or cook burgers. Size is exactly what I needed. Love this product.

customer_reviews.title: love the size
customer_reviews.text: This is working just as I hoped it would on our new 52 x 36 inch griddle!!! Love it Love it

customer_reviews.title: Great for pancakes
customer_reviews.text: Use this spatula for flipping pancakes at pancake sales. It is well made and it is the right tool for flipping large pancakes.

customer_reviews.text: I have cooked several meals using this spatula, it works very good and feels like a great tool for cooking. When I need another one I will order this same kind.

product_meta.title: Update International Extra-Large, 16-Inch Long, Grill Spatula, Turner Spatula, Barbecue BBQ Spatula, w/Cutting Edge, Solid Stainless Steel, Riveted Smooth Wood Handle, Commercial Grade
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1A heavy-duty turner spatula Made by Update international for every grill master! This extra-large commercial grade turner spatula turns and flips small to large portion food with effective ease. The turner spatula blade is made of quality stainless steel, securely riveted to a taper formed smooth wood handle and features a generous spatula face and a one-side cutting edge, used for cutting foods and meats during grilling -- a functional feature over over average large size spatulas. DIMENSIONS: Length - 16 Inches Length (spatula blade) - 10 1/2 Inches Width (spatula blade) - 4 Inch Length (handle) - 5 1/4 Inches Width (handle) - 1 1/8 Inch
feature_bullets: Quality brushed stainless steel, w/securely riveted smooth wooden handle
Large turner spatual face for managing small to large portion food
One-edged side for functional cutting during grilling, acts as a knife
Commercial grade for heavy and long durable grilling
DIMENSIONS: Length - 16 Inches, Length (spatula blade) - 10 1/2 Inches, Width (spatula blade) - 4 Inch, Lenght (handle) - 5 1/4 Inches, Width (handle) - 1 1/8 Inch
